long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New custom Kits for fantasy.premierleague.com

FPL Wildcard Kits enables a "Custom Kit Skin" for a user's Fantasy Premier League team. FPL players can add new Custom kits, Toggle between the traditional Club kit view & now see their players wearing their designed Kits, View other players' custom kits & link their Social Media profile to their FPL page creating a Team Badge.
